xmlText.p: First Period_1, Nashville, Smith 16 (Johansen, Subban), 10:02 (pp). 2, Nashville, Forsberg 16 (Johansen, Fiala), 16:02 (pp). 3, Nashville, Jarnkrok 11, 17:21.
